thread.title: Awarded by eTN and added to THE LIST: Intercontinental Bali Resort
thread.title_full: Awarded by eTN and added to THE LIST: Intercontinental Bali Resort

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Awarded by eTN and added to THE LIST: Intercontinental Bali Resort
text:
Awarded by eTN and added to THE LIST: Intercontinental Bali Resort Adv: Intercontinental Bali GM Michel Chertouh Adv: 
Intercontinental Resort Bali GM Michel Chertouh told eTurboNews. "We are delighted to receive this recognition from eTN and I am thrilled that the work of our superb team of staff has been recognized and rewarded, and I would also like to thank our guests for staying with us and experiencing the InterContinental Bali Resort first-hand.‚Äù Mr. Michel Chertouh General Manager 
The Intercontinental Bali Resort was added today to THE LIST - the eTN award category recognizing how much something is appreciated or is different. 
According to feedback received from guests, the Intercontinental Bali Resort is a special and sophisticated hotel to have a conference or corporate meeting in Bali. It is a positive example for for the MICE (Meeting and incentive) industry in Indonesia.
